description: This is an Android activity class that handles displaying poll details, submitting votes, sharing poll links, and visualizing poll results within an Android app.

classes.name: PollDetailActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for displaying poll details, handling user votes, sharing poll links, and showing poll results.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up views, loads poll data, and sets click listeners for voting and sharing.

methods.name: loadPoll
methods.description: Fetches poll data from external PollService, then displays the poll if found.

methods.name: displayPoll
methods.description: Populates the UI with poll title, options, and results if available.

methods.name: sendVote
methods.description: Sends user's vote to external PollService and reloads poll data upon success.

methods.name: showResults
methods.description: Displays poll options along with their voting counts and percentages.

methods.name: sharePoll
methods.description: Copies the poll URL to the clipboard for sharing.
